scripts.dev: concurrently -n host,sidebar,page1,page2,page3 -c cyan,green,yellow,magenta,blue "npm run dev --prefix host" "cross-env SINGLE_SPA=true npm run dev --prefix sidebar" "cross-env SINGLE_SPA=true npm run dev --prefix page1" "npm run dev --prefix page2" "npm run dev --prefix page3"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix host && npm run build --prefix sidebar && npm run build --prefix page1 && npm run build --prefix page2 && npm run build --prefix page3
